alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL KEARNEY AND SOUTHEASTERN BUFFALO COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kearney, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kearney around 820 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 272 and 284. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
